citations.narrative:
The enclosure housing the four ducks and one goose did not contain a pool or other aquatic area. The only item
containing water present was the drinking water bucket (standard horse feed bucket size). The lack of pools or other
aquatic areas of sufficient surface area and depth does not allow the birds to perform their natural postural and social
adjustments such as immersion, bathing, and swimming with adequate freedom of movement. Enclosures housing
wading and aquatic birds must contain a pool or other aquatic area along with dry areas. Correct by 11/24/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.153(c) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The enclosure housing the four ducks and one goose did not contain a pool or other aquatic area. The only item 
containing water present was the drinking water bucket (standard horse feed bucket size). The lack of pools or other 
aquatic areas of sufficient surface area and depth does not allow the birds to perform their natural postural and social 
adjustments such as immersion, bathing, and swimming with adequate freedom of movement. Enclosures housing 
wading and aquatic birds must contain a pool or other aquatic area along with dry areas. Correct by 11/24/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
